channel.title: When ppl log in to change wat chat box says

item.title: When ppl log in to change wat chat box says
item.dc:creator: @Gr4v1ty_Pk3r Gr4v1ty Pk3r
item.description:
@Gr4v1ty_Pk3r wrote:

Hmm , if you mean the start message , it’s simple.
You search for “Logged In”
When it comes up with the right starting message type the one that you want in ,
This is a simple code for you ;
To change what your server name is ;
Open Client.Java and press Ctrl + H , type in the server name it is , and the server name that you want it to be ; there is 2 boxes.
Then press , Replace All ;
It should change it , compile & run.

Read full topic
item.source: When ppl log in to change wat chat box says

item.title: When ppl log in to change wat chat box says
item.dc:creator: @andrew1234321 andrew1234321
item.description:
@andrew1234321 wrote:

if you mean change what it says inside the chatbox when somebody logs in…Then in client.java search for what it says currently, and change it. There should be 2-3 of them (one for each group, eg 1,2,3)

Read full topic
